name: c-standard-functions-highlight
description:
general c highlight doesn't support standard function symbols, so mixed with the symbols defined ourselves(wrong? oh, i'm a silly pig).

let's separate them from now on.

see in the snapshot including in the tarball. they're black, u'll know that. 

may u have a good day.
install_details:
so easy:

move this c.vim to ~/.vim/syntax if there's no same name file,
or copy the contents to the original c.vim, both works.
